channel.title: How do you guys get over an Ex-Girlfriend?
channel.description: Well this girl I been with for a long time decides to leave me for one of my best friends, the problems I have to face is the fact that I will see her everyday and my old best friend... She was my first via sexually and I just feel like trash whenever I see them together. I don't know what to do at this point.

item.title: How do you guys get over an Ex-Girlfriend?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:49, topic:537095”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=655912.msg4390368#msg4390368 date=1387251692]
Weed
[/quote]
High girls = horny girls. Especially if its their first time smoking. Or i am just one lucky f***er.

Make friends with the lonely ones. Break through their shell. You are a programmer (most likely) so you have a good imagination. Use it to word things correctly. Sweep them off their feet and they would be a fool to change their mind. I was my current girlfriends first, and she is stuck like glue (: and always horny… In highschool don’t bother with relationships though. It is always best to wait till college. and don’t rush the gun on sex. If thats all your after, then you are replaceable. If you have emotions involved in your relationships then you should be willing to wait. It is a shame that its was your best friend, but you know he is only after one thing. Just wait around till it falls apart and just be the bigger man.

and just know, someone out there is in the same boat you are. but they have herpes. They got lots lower probability of finding someone new. + the bff has herpes now too. LOL[/quote]
OMFG SEDUCING LONELY GIRLS THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I DO THEY’RE SO EASY

Read full topic

item.title: How do you guys get over an Ex-Girlfriend?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

These things suck man. My girlfriend of 2 years left me, and it was the worst shit in the world. A week after she left me I decided to go out with my friends to a party, and just my luck she was there. She tried to make conversation with me but I just walked off, and 2 hours later she was sitting on some guys lap and kept looking at me. Now normally I’d be like, aight time to clean this motherfucker out, but I thought about it and was like… then I’m stooping to her level.

I just smiled, waved, nodded and carried on like I didn’t care (tho I was dead inside l0l)… but ultimately, me keeping cool and carrying on like I didn’t care was the BEST thing I ever did. Every break up has a winner and a loser, carry on all you want but be prepared to be the loser.

tl;dr, move the fuck on

Read full topic

item.title: How do you guys get over an Ex-Girlfriend?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

You will forget your first love. Only because love is a chemical feeling, and nothing tangible or real. It’s just a word for the feeling.

Time heals all, unless you have to see her fucking your dad every day. If that is the case, I’d just suggest an hero.

item.title: How do you guys get over an Ex-Girlfriend?
item.dc:creator: @Drcode Drcode
item.description:
@Drcode wrote:

Follow Instruction

1; Slap your self
2; Man up
3; Always be Adventures
4; Don’t be scared
5; Talk to some Females(like 2+ if you can)
6; Keep talking to them for a couple days(be funny)
7; After those couple days of knowing her if you think its the right time try being sweet(not to sweet) //Too sweet will make you look “thirsty” (try sweet then a asshole) // A funny one
8; Be social and funny and fun to talk to
9; When you feel the connection try to Flirt a little with her (be like sweet obv , and bring some naughty things up)
10; Then just keep being a flirt and if you want tease the girl

Flirt lessons; (not that great)
-Hug her
-pretend she your wify
-grab hands(not to long)
-wink at her(not to awkward)
-make faces ( not to creepy or weird)
-say sweet things but in a mean way be like “ewww, your eye’s so cute”
-Play with her hair(tell her that her hair is amazing)
-be funny
-make her laugh
-kiss her on the hand
-kiss her on the cheeks(not the ass cheeks, like the cheeks on the face)

HAVE AND ADVENTURE MIND
By this i mean, like be open minded to some crazy dirty shit or crazy fun things
Some are like always making her feel like romantic exist but don’t make her fall inlove, keep it in the Friendzone(not bffzone) // like Friends with benefit
But i can’t describe to you adnventure just go outside and find it yourself or think of it…
Anyways …
Just try some of this i guess if you have balls and want to get over your ex…

IF you get rejected just go to another hoe and try again lol
Keep trying till you have a couple of them to talk too and to keep you busy

item.title: How do you guys get over an Ex-Girlfriend?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Chronikk_HD, post:27, topic:537095”]Man, look, I was with this bitch for 3 years. 3 FUCKING YEARS. everything was going good or so I thought till I found out she was banging her manager… lol. okay look at first it hurts, a lot. you gonna go through the whole listening to music that reminds you of her never wanting to leave your bed phase but it isn’t worth it. it took me maybe, 2 weeks to even start to get over her, when it shouldn’t have even taken that long . go out with your REAL friends have fun, legal or not , fornicate wenches and acquire currency . Always works for me . And when you see them together remember this

“When I see an ex with someone else I don’t feel bad, because my mom always taught me share our toys with the less fortunate” hope this all helps man .[/quote]
realest post on moparscape

item.title: How do you guys get over an Ex-Girlfriend?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Lay her on the ground and then walk over her.
Boom, you’re now “over” her.

Jokes aside. I still have very faint feelings for the first girl I loved. I got over her with alcohol, and removing all forms of contact with her. While I don’t suggest the same method (at least the alcohol bit). Shit can work.

item.title: How do you guys get over an Ex-Girlfriend?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Realize she left you because she felt she could be happier with someone else and if you really like her then you want her to be happy. All these feelings you are having right now is from selfishness. Also take this time you have now to do things you like to do and hang out with your friends.

item.title: How do you guys get over an Ex-Girlfriend?
item.dc:creator: @Techkid Techkid
item.description:
@Techkid wrote:

I’ve had this same situation but I didnt bang her… Anyways the story is that I was dating this girl named Jen and she broke up with me to date my best friend. Everytime I see them in the hall they are making out in my face! I got over this girl by thinking to myself if I was her would I treat him as I wish to be treated? of course not so I thought if she can’t respect me then why should I respect her? Completely ingored her for a couple days she got the point and came and said sorry to me. that’s how I got over a ex… I hope you can relate

item.title: How do you guys get over an Ex-Girlfriend?
item.dc:creator: @Chronikk_HD Chronikk_HD
item.description:
@Chronikk_HD wrote:

Man, look, I was with this bitch for 3 years. 3 FUCKING YEARS. everything was going good or so I thought till I found out she was banging her manager… lol. okay look at first it hurts, a lot. you gonna go through the whole listening to music that reminds you of her never wanting to leave your bed phase but it isn’t worth it. it took me maybe, 2 weeks to even start to get over her, when it shouldn’t have even taken that long . go out with your REAL friends have fun, legal or not , fornicate wenches and acquire currency . Always works for me . And when you see them together remember this

“When I see an ex with someone else I don’t feel bad, because my mom always taught me share our toys with the less fortunate” hope this all helps man .
